basicInfo.parentCompany: Independent (privately held; founded by Martin Hetzner)
basicInfo.notes: Founded in 1997 by Martin Hetzner in Gunzenhausen, Bavaria, Germany. Operates own data center parks in Nuremberg and Falkenstein (Germany), Tuusula (Finland), and colocation in US (Ashburn, VA and Hillsboro, OR). Expanded to Singapore in 2024. Uses 100% green energy. Known for best price-performance ratio in industry. Won GreenIT award 2011.

editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Best price-performance in industry (€3.49 VPS); 20TB+ bandwidth included (vs 1-5TB competitors); No renewal markup (flat pricing); Owns infrastructure (not reseller); Green energy; G2 4.5 excellent but Trustpilot 3.5 mixed; No managed services unlike Cloudways; 6 locations (fewer than some but owns them all); German data protection standards

comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Developer or business wanting affordable, high-performance infrastructure with European data sovereignty

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: Hetzner offers the best price-performance ratio in the industry, especially for VPS and dedicated servers. Excellent for developers but limited support and no managed services. G2 rating 4.5 is excellent, though Trustpilot 3.5 reflects support limitations.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: Hetzner Online GmbH is an independent German company founded by Martin Hetzner in 1997. The company remains privately held with no outside investors.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Hetzner Cloud VPS starts at €3.49/month with no renewal increase. Dedicated servers start around €39/month. 20TB+ bandwidth included on most plans.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: No, Hetzner is designed for developers and technical users. There's no cPanel, no managed WordPress, and support is limited to business hours primarily in German.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, Hetzner cloud services do not include email hosting. You must set up your own mail server or use third-party services.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, but it's completely unmanaged. You must install and maintain WordPress yourself. No one-click installers or auto-updates.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: Hetzner guarantees 99.9% uptime for most services with SLA credits available for downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, with a 14-day cancellation period for most services. Monthly billing is available with no long-term contracts.
